channel.title: Excel data source: load multiple (same structure) files from the location
channel.description:
Regarding the Excel data source, I think would be great if to have the option of loading multiple files (of same structure) by using wildcards in file selection for greater flexibility (folder\month*.xlsx)
The expected result would a concatenated table of all the files.
(initial thread here: http://discuss.redash.io/t/redash-10-excel-data-source/9207/2)
